<small>Aramaic form: [[H5075]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדַד‎</span>] **verb** ==retreat, flee, depart, stray, wander, flutter== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flee, run away***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hate, abominate, shrink from***, Aph\`el ***put to flight***, etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְדַד‎</span> ***flee*** ); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽדְדָה‎</span> [[Isa.10.31|Isa 10:31]]; [[Esth.6.1|Esth 6:1]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽדְדוּ‎</span> [[Hos.7.13|Hos 7:13]] + 4 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדָ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Isa.21.15|Isa 21:15]]; [[Jer.4.25|Jer 4:25]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדּוֺד‎</span> [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּדֹּד‎</span> [[Gen.31.40|Gen 31:40]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדֹּדוּן‎</span> [[Ps.68.13|Ps 68:13]] (twice in verse); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְדֹד‎</span> [[Ps.55.8|Ps 55:8]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹדֵד‎</span> [[Jer.49.5|Jer 49:5]] +; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺדֶ֫דֶת‎</span> [[Prov.27.8|Prov 27:8]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹדְדִים‎</span> [[Hos.9.17|Hos 9:17]] — 

**1.** ***retreat, flee*** [[Isa.21.15|Isa 21:15]] ***from before*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span>) ***swords***; [[Isa.33.3|Isa 33:3]] ***at the sound*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקּוֺל‎</span>) ***of tumult***; absolute [[Isa.10.31|Isa 10:31]]; [[Isa.22.3|Isa 22:3]]; [[Ps.68.13|Ps 68:13]] (twice in verse), of birds and beasts [[Jer.4.25|Jer 4:25]]; [[Jer.9.9|Jer 9:9]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלָ֑כוּ‎</span>); participle= ***fugitive*** [[Isa.16.3|Isa 16:3]]; [[Isa.21.14|Isa 21:14]] of fleeing in horror, disgust, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]]; [[Ps.31.12|Ps 31:12]]. 

**2.** ***flee, depart***, Israel from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(מִןׅ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Hos.7.13|Hos 7:13]] of sleep (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵינַי‎</span>) [[Gen.31.40|Gen 31:40]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), absolute [[Esth.6.1|Esth 6:1]]. 

**3.** ***wander, stray*** (homeless, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוד‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺף נוֺדֵד‎</span> [[Isa.16.2|Isa 16:2]] (in simile), so [[Prov.27.8|Prov 27:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local, in simile), compare v[[Prov.27.8|Prov 27:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local); of scattered Israel [[Hos.9.17|Hos 9:17]]; [[Jer.49.5|Jer 49:5]] (searching) for food [[Job.15.23|Job 15:23]] (wicked man); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְתִיק נְדֹד‎</span> [[Ps.55.8|Ps 55:8]] ***I will wander afar.*** 

**4.** transitive ***flutter*** wings (of bird, in figure) [[Isa.10.14|Isa 10:14]]. **Po\`el** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶשׁ זָָֽרְחָה וְנֹדַ֔ד‎</span> [[Nah.3.17|Nah 3:17]] the sun hath arisen and it ( the locust swarm) ***fleeth away.*** **Hiph\`il** ***chase away, Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִתֵּבֵל יְנִדֻּ֑הוּ‎</span> [[Job.18.18|Job 18:18]] (of wicked, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶהְדְּפֻהוּ מֵאוֺר‎</span>). **Hoph\`al** ***be chased away, Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֻדַּד כְּחֶזְיוֺן‎</span> [[Job.20.8|Job 20:8]] (of wicked); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺץ מֻנָֿד‎</span> [[2Sam.23.6|2Sam 23:6]] ***thorns thrust away*** (si vera lectio, compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדְבָּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>). **Hithpo\`el.** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְנוֺדְדוּ‎</span> [[Ps.64.9|Ps 64:9]] ***flee away*** (in horror, disgust, compare **Qal** [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]]; [[Ps.31.12|Ps 31:12]]).
